title: Enterprise MCP Atlassian Server
description: Autonomous agent integration for Jira and Confluence, cutting AI operation costs by $120k/year.

children.value: Developed an internal Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that allows AI models to interact securely with Atlassian tools. This reduced manual data entry and improved team velocity.

title: Autonomous AI Project Brain
description: Agentic workflow system utilizing TAO hierarchy for automated Jira prioritization.

children.value: Implemented an AI agent system that acts as a technical project manager, analyzing Slack context to draft and rank Jira tickets.

title: Real-time Kappa Data Pipelines
description: High-speed event processing using Kafka and Flink for real-time CRM updates.

children.value: Designed and implemented horizontal scaling Kappa architecture pipelines processing 330M files. Orchestrated Kafka -> Flink -> Braze integration for real-time player engagement.

title: 5TB+ Integrated Data Platform
description: Architecting a source-of-truth master data warehouse with PII security at scale.

children.value: Managed a massive data ecosystem involving 330M files. Focused on PII compliance, data quality, and foundation building for future AI/ML use cases.

title: High-Performance Reverse ETL
description: Custom framework for ingesting 20M+ rows hourly from S3 to Aurora PostgreSQL.

children.value: Optimized data ingestion by 75% using asynchronous Python operations. Built a robust reverse-ETL framework for marketing campaign targeting.

title: Infrastructure-as-Code Uplift
description: Migrating 18+ CI/CD pipelines to GitHub Actions and implementing AWS CDK.

children.value: Modernized devops practices by replacing Jenkins with GHA. Reduced deployment times by 55% and storage costs by 85%.

title: Cancer Cell Growth Simulation
description: Mathematical modeling and statistical analysis of biological growth patterns.

children.value: Modeled complex biological systems using Pandas and Seaborn for visualization. Part of a computational biology research initiative.

title: Fake News Tweet Classifier
description: Deep learning NLP model using BERT to detect misinformation at scale.

children.value: Leveraged BERT and PyTorch to classify social media content. Achieved high accuracy on multi-source datasets.

title: Real-time Fighter Plane Detector
description: Computer vision system achieving 55+fps using YOLOv2, CUDA, and cuDNN.

children.value: Developed a real-time object detection system during my ML internship. Focused on performance optimization for edge computing.
